marklogic.body: If only this man had had the benefit of apple Slices in his school cafeteria vending machines during the wild orgiastic days of carbohydrate excess, 'Pre-Obama'. Hopefully the 'First Patient Dumper', Michelle Obozo will be shielded from this failure of capitalism by her handlers to spare her a Fainting spell. We can only pray for the days ahead when we'll all be shuffling around, chained to one another at the ankle and steered well clear of Mars bars and 'sugary drinks'. Support our First Lady of our Union Of Socialist States Of America or every male will be decked out in 'mansieres' for sure.
